summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5306 for the improvement of West 49th Street, from 2nd Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61459, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
